description:
The wide brim of this classic sun hat provides generous shade on a bright summer's day. Lightweight, quick-dry fabric has a UPF of 50+, to protect against sun exposure.

  • Made of Supplex®, 100% nylon fabric, with UPF 50+
  • Brim is foam-stiffened for flotation, making it ideal for boating
  • Wicking headband provides comfort and moisture management
  • External drawcord adjustment lets you customize the fit
  • Break-away chin cord is safe and secure
name: Outdoor Research Rambler Sun Hat - Children to Youths
